title: Çigköftem - Wanheimerstrasse
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Fast food, Take-out, Middle Eastern, Turkish, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Offers a vegan vegetable pate made of grains, walnuts, tomato puree, sunflower oil, parsley and green onions that shape into little balls or fingers and put in wraps or with mixed plates. Also available in take out packages. Some of the locations of this chain serve meat, but it was not stated to HappyCow about this particular location. If you know either way please contact us; thank you.
